Title: Art Appreciation
Plot: There's a big Art Show happening at the Blue's Clues house. We pose for a portrait for Steve. We alaso find that there's something fishy going on, when fish seem to be popping up in artwork everywhere. In a Blue Skiddoo segment, we help soem friends to get back to the paintings where they belong.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Joyce Raimondo, Matthew Castleton, Miryam Coppersmith, Sean Geary, Matthew Holsten, Allen Keller, Alexandra Kelley, Kenny Kim, David B. Levy, David Reber, Benjamin Rodriguez, Benjamin Rousseau, Kaitlyn Trugila, D
